caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee, v. PAUL A. KECK,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (ICA NO. 29530; CR. NO. 04-1-0871)
opinion.attorneys: Earle A. Partington for petitioner/defendant-appellant on the application.

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: RECKTENWALD, C.J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Recktenwald, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, Duffy, and McKenna, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant Paul A. Keck's application for writ of certiorari filed on March 14, 2011, is hereby rejected.Page 1
